last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the police and Goyal's men go after Neelam and Keshav, Sheel carries out one last vindictive plan — and then makes an alarming discovery.

name: Mai: A Mother's Rage
overview: A grieving mother discovers the criminals behind her daughter's tragic death, and transforms from meek to merciless to get the real story.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A grieving mother discovers the criminals behind her daughter's tragic death, and transforms from meek to merciless to get the real story.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After Sheel's daughter is tragically hit by a truck, peculiar details lead her to suspect it wasn't an accident, and she begins probing for the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As Jawahar's insiders learn of last night's events and hunt for a crucial crypto key, Sheel gets some unexpected help. Farooque takes on Supriya's case.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After a scare, Sheel takes the hunt for the crypto key into her own hands. Farooque confronts Neelam about the hidden cash, but underestimates her power.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Despite a rift with her family, Sheel pursues a plot against her target, but faces more trouble than she anticipated. Farooque intercepts a key player.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A criminal returns to town to exact revenge. A tip leads Sheel to use the crypto key to frame an enemy. Farooque gets a final chance to nab Neelam.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the police and Goyal's men go after Neelam and Keshav, Sheel carries out one last vindictive plan — and then makes an alarming discovery.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A grieving mother discovers the criminals behind her daughter's tragic death, and transforms from meek to merciless to get the real story.
